verbose_text: To investigate the molecular markers of mesenchymal cells that distinguish esophagus and respiratory organs, we performed in situ hybridization using esophagus mesenchyme specific Wnt4 (XREF_FIG Ba, b ') (GSE118641, Gene Expression Omnibus), respiratory organ specific Tbx4 (XREF_FIG Ca, b '), and Hoxb6, which is expressed in the distal portion of the bronchus mesenchyme (XREF_FIG Dd).
